summary: This document is an email correspondence detailing financial transfers and account values related to Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities. It outlines various banking and investment accounts, their market values as of December 31, 2013, and the status of transfers for these accounts.

keyFacts: The document details financial transfers and account values related to Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities.
Ghislaine Maxwell has multiple banking and investment accounts with significant assets listed.
The total assets for Ghislaine Maxwell amount to approximately $14.7 million.
